snippet.title: Grimoires and Guns Official Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
DISCLAIMER: 
1 - The gameplay footage is from a pré-alpha version, it might change even for the alpha and definetly the next versions, betas and final release. 
2 - We use Artificial Inteligence (Midjourney) to generate some backgrounds, use as resorces for photobash and to ilustrate the cards, but all characters on the game, on the story scenes and animations as well as the overall design and the board background were hand drawn by us! We are a small team of 4 people (from Brazil xD) with 0 founds as of this moment, we plan to change all of that when we can afford a fulltime artists and grow the team. 

Grimoires and Guns is a free to play, competitive hero builder auto battler card game! The alpha version is coming soon, if anyone wants to play and help us shape the future of the game join our discord! 

Original Soundtrack by Débora de Paula @deboradepaula4546 
follow her on instagram: @likeawitch


Team: 

João Filho 
Débora de Paula
Kamilla Veras
Arthur Tribuzi

LINKS: 

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/qQMUt32aEd
Website: https://viasomni.com/
Itch.io: https://viasomni.itch.io/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/viasomnigames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/viasomnigames
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@viasomnigames

Thanks for your time!
